message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find very valuable. Given its potential, I'm suggesting a starting price of $950,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I recognize your offer, the value of this product is considerably higher. Would you be willing to meet halfway at $900,000?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $875,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
